articles.author: Samya Kullab, John Leicester
articles.title: Deterrence is a key issue as army chiefs from 30-plus countries talk about a Ukraine force - The Associated Press
articles.description: Ukraine was hoping for answers to key questions as European army chiefs and other military officials from over 30 countries met in Paris for talks on an international force for Ukraine after any ceasefire. Ukrainian questions center on the number of troops su…
articles.content: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) Top military officials from across Europe and beyond joined talks in Paris on Tuesday on the possible contours of an international security force for Ukraine an idea that France an… [+6349 chars]
